channel.title: Reduce numbers of grub live-mode boot menu entries
channel.description:
whonix startup confusing grub live-mode options:
whenever there is a new linux kernel version installed it will add up to the live-mode list instead of choosing the latest version.
the list going to be like this:
``` start whonix advanced... live-mode kernel x live-mode kernel y live-mode kernel z ```
facially and practically not great.
Solution:
https://github.com/Kicksecure/grub-live/blob/master/etc/grub.d/11_linux_live#L19
disable `GRUB_DISABLE_SUBMENU="y"`
then its going to be:
``` start whonix advanced... Live mode advanced... ```
way much better.
